item.title: Fórmulas
item.description:
La siguiente notación será usada para este formulario:





\frac{d}{dx} x = 1 Copiar






\frac{d}{dx} c = 0 Copiar






\frac{d}{dx} c \cdot f(x) = c \cdot \frac{d}{dx} f(x) Copiar




Linealidad de la derivada




\frac{d}{dx} (f(x) + g(x) - h(x)) = \frac{d}{dx} f(x) + \frac{d}{dx} g(x) - \frac{d}{dx} h(x) Copiar




Linealidad de la derivada
Derivada de una suma de funciones




\frac{d}{dx} f(g(x)) = \frac{df}{dg} \cdot \frac{dg}{dx} Copiar





\frac{d}{dx} f(g(h(x))) = \frac{df}{dg} \cdot \frac{dg}{dh} \cdot \frac{dh}{dx} Copiar




Regla de la cadena




\frac{d}{dx} (u \cdot v) = u\cdot\frac{dv}{dx} + v\cdot\frac{du}{dx} Copiar





\frac{d}{dx} (u \cdot v \cdot w) = \frac{du}{dx}\cdot v \cdot w + u\cdot\frac{dv}{dx}\cdot w + u \cdot v \cdot \frac{dw}{dx} Copiar






\frac{d}{dx} \frac{u}{v} = \frac{\displaystyle v\cdot\frac{du}{dx} - u \cdot \frac{dv}{dx}}{\displaystyle v^2} Copiar






\frac{d}{dx} u^n = n\cdot u^{n-1} \cdot \frac{du}{dx} Copiar






\frac{d}{dx} log_c(u) = \frac{1}{u\cdot ln(c)}\cdot \frac{du}{dx} Copiar





\frac{d}{dx} ln(u) = \frac{1}{u}\cdot \frac{du}{dx} Copiar






\frac{d}{dx} e^u = e^u \cdot \frac{du}{dx} Copiar





\frac{d}{dx} c^u = c^u\cdot ln(a) \cdot \frac{du}{dx} Copiar






\frac{d}{dx} u^v = v \cdot u^{v-1} \cdot \frac{du}{dx} + u^v \cdot ln(u) \cdot \frac{dv}{dx} Copiar






\frac{d}{dx} |x| = \frac{x}{ |x| } Copiar







\frac{d}{dx} sin(u) = cos(u)\cdot\frac{du}{dx} Copiar






\frac{d}{dx} cos(u) = -sin(u) \cdot\frac{du}{dx} Copiar






\frac{d}{dx} tan(u) = sec^2(u) \cdot\frac{du}{dx} Copiar






\frac{d}{dx} cot(u) = -csc^2(u) \cdot\frac{du}{dx} Copiar






\frac{d}{dx} sec(u) = sec(u)\cdot tan(u) \cdot\frac{du}{dx} Copiar






\frac{d}{dx} csc(u) = -csc(u)\cdot cot(u) \cdot\frac{du}{dx} Copiar






\frac{d}{dx} arcsin(u) = \frac{1}{\sqrt{1-u^2}}\cdot\frac{du}{dx} Copiar




Seno inverso




\frac{d}{dx} arccos(u) = -\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-u^2}} \cdot\frac{du}{dx} Copiar




Coseno inverso




\frac{d}{dx} arctan(u) = \frac{1}{{1+u^2}} \cdot\frac{du}{dx} Copiar




Tangente inversa




\frac{d}{dx} arccot(u) = -\frac{1}{{1+u^2}} \cdot\frac{du}{dx} Copiar




Cotangente inversa




\frac{d}{dx} arcsec(u) = \frac{1}{u\cdot\sqrt{u^2-1}} \cdot\frac{du}{dx} Copiar




Secante inversa




\frac{d}{dx} arccsc(u) = -\frac{1}{u\cdot\sqrt{u^2-1}} \cdot\frac{du}{dx} Copiar




Cosecante inversa





\frac{d}{dx} sinh(u) = cosh(u)\cdot\frac{du}{dx} Copiar






\frac{d}{dx} cosh(u) = sinh(u) \cdot\frac{du}{dx} Copiar






\frac{d}{dx} tanh(u) = sec^2(u) \cdot\frac{du}{dx} Copiar






\frac{d}{dx} coth(u) = -csc^2(u) \cdot\frac{du}{dx} Copiar






\frac{d}{dx} sech(u) = -sech(u)\cdot tanh(u) \cdot\frac{du}{dx} Copiar






\frac{d}{dx} csch(u) = -csch(u)\cdot coth(u) \cdot\frac{du}{dx} Copiar






\frac{d}{dx} arcsinh(u) = \frac{1}{\sqrt{1+u^2}}\cdot\frac{du}{dx} Copiar






\frac{d}{dx} arccosh(u) = \frac{1}{\sqrt{u^2-1}} \cdot\frac{du}{dx} Copiar






\frac{d}{dx} arctanh(u) = \frac{1}{{1-u^2}} \cdot\frac{du}{dx} Copiar






\frac{d}{dx} arccoth(u) = -\frac{1}{{1-u^2}} \cdot\frac{du}{dx} Copiar






\frac{d}{dx} arcsech(u) = -\frac{1}{u\cdot\sqrt{1-u^2}} \cdot\frac{du}{dx} Copiar






\frac{d}{dx} arccsch(u) = -\frac{1}{ |u|\cdot\sqrt{1+u^2}} \cdot\frac{du}{dx} Copiar
item.dc:creator: Kesadilla

item.title: Fórmulas
item.description:
La siguiente notación será usada para este formulario:






\int dx = x + \mathfrak{C} Copiar





\int c\cdot du = c \int du Copiar





\int(du + dv + dw) = \int du + \int dv - \int dw Copiar






\int u^n du = \frac{u^{n+1}}{n+1} + \mathfrak{C}, (n\neq -1) Copiar





\int u^{-1}du = ln(u) + \mathfrak{C} Copiar





\int e^udu = e^u + \mathfrak{C} Copiar





\int a^udu = \frac{a^u}{ln(a)} + \mathfrak{C} Copiar






\int sin(u)du = -cos(u) + \mathfrak{C} Copiar





\int cos(u)du = sin(u) + \mathfrak{C} Copiar





\int tan(u)du = -ln(cos(u)) + \mathfrak{C} = ln(sec(u)) + \mathfrak{C} Copiar





\int cot(u)du = ln(sin(u)) + \mathfrak{C} Copiar





\int sec(u)du = ln(sec(u) + tan(u)) + \mathfrak{C} Copiar





\int csc(u)du = ln(csc(u) - cot(u)) + \mathfrak{C} Copiar





\int sec^2(u)du = tan(u) + \mathfrak{C} Copiar





\int csc^2(u)du = -cot(u) + \mathfrak{C} Copiar





\int sec(u)tan(u)du = sec(u) + \mathfrak{C} Copiar





\int csc(u)cot(u)du = -csc(u) + \mathfrak{C} Copiar






\int \frac{du}{u^2 + c^2} = \frac{1}{c}arctan\left(\frac{u}{a}\right) + \mathfrak{C} Copiar





\int \frac{du}{u^2 - c^2} = \frac{1}{2c}ln \left(\frac{u-c}{u+c}\right) + \mathfrak{C} Copiar





\int \frac{du}{c^2 - u^2} = \frac{1}{2c}ln \left(\frac{c+u}{c-u}\right) + \mathfrak{C} Copiar





\int \frac{du}{\sqrt{c^2-u^2}} = arcsin \left( \frac{u}{a} \right) + \mathfrak{C} Copiar





\int \frac{du}{u\sqrt{u^2-c^2}} = \frac{1}{c} arcsec \left( \frac{u}{a} \right) + \mathfrak{C} Copiar





\int \frac{du}{\sqrt{u^2 \pm c^2}} = ln\left( u + \sqrt{u^2 \pm c^2} \right) + \mathfrak{C} Copiar





\int \sqrt{c^2-u^2}du = \frac{u}{2}\sqrt{c^2-u^2} + \frac{c^2}{2}arcsin\left( \frac{u}{a} \right) + \mathfrak{C} Copiar





\int \sqrt{u^2\pm c^2}du = \frac{u}{2}\sqrt{u^2 \pm c^2} \pm \frac{c^2}{2}ln\left( u + \sqrt{u^2 + c^2} \right) + \mathfrak{C} Copiar




Derivadas
item.dc:creator: Kesadilla

item.title: Fórmulas
item.description:
V(s) = V_0^+ e^{-\gamma s} - V_0^- e^{\gamma s} Copiar


V(s) = V_0^+ e^{-\gamma s} - V_0^- e^{\gamma s} Copiar



\Gamma(0) = \frac{V_{0}^{-}}{V_{0}^{+}} = \frac{Z_L-Z_{0}}{Z_{L}+Z_{0}} Copiar


\Gamma(0) = \frac{V_{0}^{-}}{V_{0}^{+}} = \frac{Z_L-Z_{0}}{Z_{L}+Z_{0}} Copiar



\gamma=\alpha+j\beta Copiar


\gamma=\alpha+j\beta Copiar


: Constante de atenuación

\beta = \frac{\omega}{v_{p}} Copiar


\beta = \frac{\omega}{v_{p}} Copiar



v_p=\frac{c}{\sqrt{ \varepsilon_{r} }} Copiar


v_p=\frac{c}{\sqrt{ \varepsilon_{r} }} Copiar




R. Neri and Beltrán Porragas Luis H., Líneas de transmisión, 1a ed. Xalapa, México: Universidad Veracruzana, 2013. (pp. 69 - 71)
item.dc:creator: Kesadilla

item.title: Fórmulas
item.description:
\eta = \frac{P_{BL}}{P_T} Copiar







P_C = \frac{A^2}{2} [W] Copiar



P_{BL} = \frac{1}{2} \overline{m^2(t)} [W] = \frac{1}{2T} \int_0^T m^2(t) \, dt Copiar


P_{BL} = \frac{1}{2} \overline{m^2(t)} [W] = \frac{1}{2T} \int_0^T m^2(t) \, dt Copiar







T_C \ll C R_L \ll T_m Copiar




Transformada de Fourier
item.dc:creator: Kesadilla

item.title: Fórmulas
item.description:
f(t) = \frac{a_0}{2} + \sum_{n=1}^{\infty} \left[ a_n \cos(n\omega_0 t) + b_n \sin(n\omega_0 t) \right] Copiar






a_0 = \frac{2}{T} \int_{0}^{T} f(t) \, dt Copiar





a_n = \frac{2}{T} \int_{0}^{T} f(t) \cos(n\omega_0 t) \, dt Copiar





b_n = \frac{2}{T} \int_{0}^{T} f(t) \sin(n\omega_0 t) \, dt Copiar






f(t) = \frac{a_0}{2} + \sum_{n=1}^{\infty} a_n \cos(n\omega_0 t) Copiar






f(t) = \sum_{n=1}^{\infty} b_n \sin(n\omega_0 t) Copiar






f(t) = \sum_{n=-\infty}^{\infty} c_n e^{jn\omega_0 t} Copiar






c_{0} = \frac{1}{T} \int_{0}^{T} f(t) \, dt Copiar





c_n = \frac{1}{T} \int_{0}^{T} f(t) e^{-jn\omega_0 t} \, dt Copiar





c_{-n} = c_{n}^{*} Copiar






a_n = c_n + c_{-n} Copiar





b_n = j\left[ c_{n} - c_{-n} \right] Copiar





c_n = \frac{ a_n - jb_n}{2} Copiar





c_{-n} = \frac{a_n + jb_n}{2} Copiar
item.dc:creator: Kesadilla

item.title: Fórmulas
item.description:
F(\omega) = \int_{-\infty}^{\infty} f(t) \cdot e^{-j\omega t} \, dt Copiar


F(\omega) = \int_{-\infty}^{\infty} f(t) \cdot e^{-j\omega t} \, dt Copiar



f(t) = \frac{1}{2\pi} \int_{-\infty}^{\infty} F(\omega) \cdot e^{j\omega t} \, d\omega Copiar


f(t) = \frac{1}{2\pi} \int_{-\infty}^{\infty} F(\omega) \cdot e^{j\omega t} \, d\omega Copiar




\mathcal{F}\{af(t) + bg(t)\} = aF(\omega) + bG(\omega) Copiar


\mathcal{F}\{af(t) + bg(t)\} = aF(\omega) + bG(\omega) Copiar



\mathcal{F}\{f(t - t_0)\} = F(\omega)e^{-i\omega t_0} Copiar


\mathcal{F}\{f(t - t_0)\} = F(\omega)e^{-i\omega t_0} Copiar



\mathcal{F}\{e^{i\omega_0 t}f(t)\} = F(\omega - \omega_0) Copiar


\mathcal{F}\{e^{i\omega_0 t}f(t)\} = F(\omega - \omega_0) Copiar






F(-\omega) = F^*(\omega) Copiar





Convolución de Tiempo Continuo y el CTFT. (2022, October 30). Rice University. https://espanol.libretexts.org/@go/page/86343

\mathcal{F}\left\{f * g\right\} = \mathcal{F}\left\{f\right\} \cdot \mathcal{F}\left\{g\right\} Copiar


\mathcal{F}\left\{f * g\right\} = \mathcal{F}\left\{f\right\} \cdot \mathcal{F}\left\{g\right\} Copiar



\mathcal{F}\left\{f \cdot g\right\} = \frac{1}{2\pi} \mathcal{F}\left\{f\right\} * \mathcal{F}\left\{g\right\} Copiar


\mathcal{F}\left\{f \cdot g\right\} = \frac{1}{2\pi} \mathcal{F}\left\{f\right\} * \mathcal{F}\left\{g\right\} Copiar




Series de Fourier
Variable compleja

item.description:
Identidades triángulo unitario


https://www.matesfacil.com/ESO/trigonometria/identidades/identidades-trigonometricas-demostraciones-ejemplos.html En la sección (3. Demostraciones) del inciso 1 al 3




\sin^2(t) + \cos^2(t) = 1 Copiar




Seno al cuadrado
Coseno al cuadrado




\sec^2(t) - \tan^2(t) = 1 Copiar




Tangente al cuadrado




\csc^2(t) - \cot^2(t) = 1 Copiar




Cotangente al cuadrado




\cos(2t) = 2 \cos^2(t) - 1 Copiar




Coseno al cuadrado

e^{ix}=\cos x+i\, \sin x Copiar


e^{ix}=\cos x+i\, \sin x Copiar



z^{*} = Re \{ z \} - j Im \{ z \} Copiar


z^{*} = Re \{ z \} - j Im \{ z \} Copiar







\sin x={e^{jx}-e^{-jx} \over 2j} Copiar






\cos x={e^{jx}+e^{-jx} \over 2} Copiar
